page.title: 11PLAYGROUP AT ST.STEPHENS.
page.content: There are several playgroups in our area for 3\5 year old children.Kristen asked about the Community Centre group at St. Stephens. It is a non assisted, non profit making organisation funded by fees and general local fund raising. There are 4 qualified paid staff and one duty mother. The group meets 5 mornings a week 9.30-12.15 in term time.Activities include hand/eye coordinated games, using glue, cutting, water, sand, jigsaws,playdough,building toys etc, and large apparatus- climbing frame, slide, mobile toys,and home corner.4 year old children do some writing and number work, take local walks. They go on an outing every year u ually to Brambles Nature Park. In Summer there is a Fete and at Christmas there is a party for all the children.
